channel.title: Alching prices on richscape
channel.description: i can't change the alching prices without changing the sale price for all the items..if i change the price to 50k, then the alching price would be 50k...im using the newest richscape source any help? :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2009, 06:22:41 pm[/size][hr]come on at least try to help?

item.title: Alching prices on richscape
item.dc:creator: @Muck_Sticky Muck Sticky
item.description:
@Muck_Sticky wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:2, topic:278914”]you got at item.cfg

you got 15 numbers.
this is what all numbers are:1: Shop Price 2: Low Alch Value 3: High Alch Value 4: Stab Att Boost 5: Slash Att Boost 6: Crush Att Boost 7: Magic Att Boost 8: Range Att Boost 9: Stab Def Boost 10: Slash Def Boost 11: Crush Def Boost 12: Magic Def Boost 13: Range Def Boost 14: Strength Boost 15: Prayer Boost[/quote]not on richscape…the first 3 are different…the second number that should be low alch is high alch and the shop price

Read full topic
